episodes.title: 'The Exclusive Brethren", HTV Midweek documentary 1993
episodes.description: HTV Midweek documentary ''The Exclusive Brethren' made and' broadcast in 1993, written by Tom Archer and produced by Jeremy Payne. Watch as a sequence with 'BBC Omnibus documentary 'Doctrine That Divides' (1976) and follow with BBC documentary on the Exclusive Brethren made in 2003. Both on YouTube. And then if you want to know more about life inside the cult read the memoir called 'In The Days of Rain' by Rebecca Stott.

episodes.title: 'Doctrine That Divides', BBC Omnibus Exclusive Brethren documentary, 1976
episodes.description: Rare copy of an early BBC documentary about the Exclusive Brethren: BBC Omnibus, 'Doctrine that Divides', presented by Peter France and directed by Jim Murray, made in 1975 and broadcast in September 1976, six years after the Aberdeen Incident and two years after the Roger Panes murders. It features an interview with Roger Stott subject of the Costa-Award-winning 'In the Days of Rain' (2017) written by his daughter Rebecca Stott.
